displayName: () - How important is it, that this ToDo gets done?
+ - Who is responsible for this ToDO?
? - How do you referr to this ToDo?
% - What is part of this ToDo?
^ - What has to be done first?
@ - In which context would you do this ToDo?
# - What do you want to link this ToDo to?
: - When has this ToDo be done?
